solution_line_template: Jay invited {jay_invited_guests} guests and Gloria invited {gloria_invited_guests} so they invited {jay_invited_guests}+{gloria_invited_guests} = <<{jay_invited_guests}+{gloria_invited_guests}={total_guests_invited}>>{total_guests_invited} guests

They also each wanted a flag so in total they would need {jay_own_flag}+{gloria_own_flag}+{total_guests_invited} = <<{jay_own_flag}+{gloria_own_flag}+{total_guests_invited}={total_flags_required}>>{total_flags_required} flags

The craft store has them on sale at {flags_per_dollar_bundle} for ${cost_per_dollar_bundle} and they need {total_flags_required} flags so the flags will cost them {total_flags_required}/{flags_per_dollar_bundle} = ${total_cost_dollars}
